PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Full width at half maximum (FWHM) - This is a property value that refers to the width of a molecular absorption spectrum.
2. PCDSeBT - This is a property value that refers to the width of the absorption spectrum of a specific molecule, which is 155 nm in this case.
3. PDCTBT - This is a property value that refers to the width of the absorption spectrum of another specific molecule, which is 140 nm in this case.
4. J SC value - This is a property value that refers to the jumping distance of a specific molecule, which is not explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are: FWHM, PCDSeBT, PDCTBT, and J SC value.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. FWHM - Full width at half maximum, which refers to the width of a molecular absorption spectrum.
2. PCDSeBT - The width of the absorption spectrum of a specific molecule, which is 155 nm in this case.
3. J SC value - The jumping distance of a specific molecule, which is not explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
